description: A pytest test suite for the SQLite template project, including fixtures for creating mock templates, configuration, and tests for project initialization, database creation, template variable replacement, and related functionalities.

methods.name: temp_dir()
methods.description: Creates a temporary directory for test outputs.

methods.name: template_dir(temp_dir)
methods.description: Creates a mock template directory with configuration and script files for testing.

methods.name: project_config(temp_dir)
methods.description: Creates a sample ProjectConfig object for testing.

methods.name: test_sqlite_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Validates that the template's initial setup info can be retrieved correctly.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Tests the initialization of a project, including file creation and content replacement.

methods.name: test_database_creation(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies that the generated init_db.py script successfully creates the SQLite database with proper schema and data.

methods.name: test_default_database_name(template_dir, temp_dir)
methods.description: Checks the default database name pattern when not explicitly provided in parameters.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Ensures that post-processing scripts are executed properly and can generate side effects.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Verifies loading project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Checks that template placeholders are correctly replaced with project-specific variables in files.

methods.name: test_sqlite_specific_features(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Checks features specific to SQLite, such as no need for user/password and port defaults.

methods.name: test_entry_point_url(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies the correctness of the generated entry point URL for the project.
